technique: In a closed hold the leed sets up with their right foot between the follow's feet. the body has a right side lead. the right arm wraps around the follows back up to their spine. the left arm slopes up in a frame to take the follows right hand in a relaxed hold
name: Basic Setup notes: Lead

technique: The follow sets up in front of the lead. the left arm wraps around the lead up to / around the neck
name: Basic Setup notes: Follow

technique: at a more advanced level each step can be taken with cbm
name: Notes on Basic Steps

technique: While timing is interpretive, for the purpose of learning these moves, steps are started on odd numbers 1,3,5,7. the  timing can be Slow Quick Quick  or 1,2, &, 3,4,&
name: Notes on timing
